mapper.select: SELECT WK_ID, WD_ID, WD_TITLE, WD_ERRORYN, TO_CHAR (WD_ENDDATE, 'YYMMDD') WD_ENDDATE, WD_COMPLYN FROM RC_WORKDETAIL WHERE WK_ID = #{wk_id} AND WD_DELYN = 'N' ORDER BY WD_ENDDATE
SELECT WK_ID, WD_ID, WD_TITLE, WD_ERRORYN, TO_CHAR (WD_ENDDATE, 'YYMMDD') WD_ENDDATE, WD_COMPLYN FROM RC_WORKDETAIL WHERE WK_ID = #{wk_id} AND WD_DELYN = 'N' AND WD_COMPLYN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RC_WORKDETAIL (WD_ID, WD_TITLE, WD_ENDDATE, WK_ID, WD_REGDATE) VALUES (#{wd_id} , #{wd_title}, TO_DATE (#{wd_endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{wk_id}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_WORKDETAIL SET WD_TITLE = #{wd_title}, WD_ENDDATE = TO_DATE(#{wd_endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE WD_ID = #{wd_id}
UPDATE RC_WORKDETAIL SET WD_COMPLYN = 'Y' WHERE WD_ID = #{wd_id}
UPDATE RC_WORKDETAIL SET WD_ERRORYN = #{wd_erroryn} WHERE WD_ID = #{wd_id}
UPDATE RC_WORKDETAIL SET WD_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE WD_ID = #{wd_id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RC_WORKLIST (WK_ID, WK_TITLE, MEM_ID, WK_ENDDATE, PR_ID) VALUES (#{wk_id}, #{wk_title}, #{mem_id}, TO_DATE (#{wk_endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{pr_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE RC_WORKDETAIL SET WD_DELYN = 'Y' WHERE WK_ID = #{wk_id}
